<js>
a=org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(String(result).match(/id="content">([\s\S]*?)<\/div/)[1]).html();



var content=String(result.match(/function\s*getDecode\(\)\{(.*)\}/)[1]);

//还原屏蔽段落

content=content.replace(/\\/g,"/")
.replace(/[A-Z]=~\[\];[A-Z]=\{___.*?[A-Z],\$__\$:\+\+[A-Z]}\;/,"")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.\$__\$/g,"9")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.\$___/g,"8")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.\$\$\$/g,"7")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.\$\$_/g,"6")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.\$_\$/g,"5")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.\$__/g,"4")
.replace(/[A-Z]\._\$\$/g,"3")
.replace(/[A-Z]\._\$_/g,"2")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.__\$/g,"1")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.___/g,"0")
.replace(/\+|"/g,"")
.replace(/[A-Z].*?\(\!\[\]\)\[2\]/,"")
.replace(/\/\/170/g,"x")
.replace(/\/\/106/g,"F")
.replace(/\/\/105/g,"E")
.replace(/\/\/104/g,"D")
.replace(/\/\/103/g,"C")
.replace(/\/\/102/g,"B")
.replace(/\/\/101/g,"A")
.replace(/\('/,"")
.replace(/'\).*/,"")
.replace(/\/\/74\/{2,3}160\/\/76/g,"\n")
.replace(/\/\/\/\/[A-Z]\._(.{4})/g,"%u$1");
result=String(a+unescape(content));
result=result.replace(/防采集自动加载失败，点击手动加载，推荐安装最新版浏览器！/,"")

</js>

<js>
var D1 = '::', D2 = '&&';
var link = 'https://m.ebtang.com/m/book/booklistJson?page=searchPage&rows=30&bookRoomOrderByType=6&sortType=&tagIds=&bookRoomWordType=-1&bookRoomUpdateType=-1&bookRoomVipType=-1&bookRoomFinishType=-1&randomString={{Date.now()}}';
var jdoc = JSON.parse(String(java.ajax(link.replace('searchPage', '1'))));
result = jdoc.categoryList.map(v => v.name + D1 + link.replace(/([?&]sortType=)[^?&]*/, '$1'+v.id));
result.unshift('🔹书库'+D1+link);
result = result.join(D2);
</js>
ruleSearchList:
<js>
var jdoc = JSON.parse(String(result));
result = /[?&]searchName/.test(baseUrl)
  ? jdoc.bookList.filter(v => v.name.includes(jdoc.searchName) || v.authorNick.includes(jdoc.searchName))
  : jdoc.bookList;
</js>
ruleBookContent:
if (/\.google\.cn/.test(baseUrl)){ result = decodeURIComponent(baseUrl.replace(/^.+[&?]text=/, '')); } else{ var r = java.getString('id.randomString@value'); var link = baseUrl.replace(/^.*\/(\d+\/\d+)$/, 'https://m.ebtang.com/m/book/readbook/$1/more?randomString='+r); result = JSON.parse(String(java.ajax(link))); result = result.bookChapter.content; } result = String(result).replace(/]{1,200}>/ig, '

<js>
a=org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(String(result).match(/id="content">([\s\S]*?)<\/div/)[1]).html();



var content=String(result.match(/function\s*getDecode\(\)\{(.*)\}/)[1]);

//还原屏蔽段落

content=content.replace(/\\/g,"/")
.replace(/[A-Z]=~\[\];[A-Z]=\{___.*?[A-Z],\$__\$:\+\+[A-Z]}\;/,"")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.\$__\$/g,"9")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.\$___/g,"8")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.\$\$\$/g,"7")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.\$\$_/g,"6")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.\$_\$/g,"5")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.\$__/g,"4")
.replace(/[A-Z]\._\$\$/g,"3")
.replace(/[A-Z]\._\$_/g,"2")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.__\$/g,"1")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.___/g,"0")
.replace(/\+|"/g,"")
.replace(/[A-Z].*?\(\!\[\]\)\[2\]/,"")
.replace(/\/\/170/g,"x")
.replace(/\/\/106/g,"F")
.replace(/\/\/105/g,"E")
.replace(/\/\/104/g,"D")
.replace(/\/\/103/g,"C")
.replace(/\/\/102/g,"B")
.replace(/\/\/101/g,"A")
.replace(/\/\/114/g,"L")
.replace(/\/\/166/g,"v")
.replace(/\('/,"")
.replace(/'\).*/,"")
.replace(/\/\/74\/{2,3}160\/\/76/g,"\n")
.replace(/\/\/\/\/[A-Z]\._(.{4})/g,"%u$1");
result=String(a+unescape(content));
result=result.replace(/防采集自动加载失败，点击手动加载，不支持阅读模式，请安装最新版浏览器！/,"")

</js>

a=org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(String(result).match(/id="content">([\s\S]*?)<\/div/)[1]).html();



var content=String(result.match(/function\s*getDecode\(\)\{(.*)\}/)[1]);

//还原屏蔽段落

content=content.replace(/\\/g,"/")
.replace(/[A-Z]=~\[\];[A-Z]=\{___.*?[A-Z],\$__\$:\+\+[A-Z]}\;/,"")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.\$__\$/g,"9")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.\$___/g,"8")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.\$\$\$/g,"7")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.\$\$_/g,"6")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.\$_\$/g,"5")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.\$__/g,"4")
.replace(/[A-Z]\._\$\$/g,"3")
.replace(/[A-Z]\._\$_/g,"2")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.__\$/g,"1")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.___/g,"0")
.replace(/\+|"/g,"")

//取正文
a=org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(String(result).match(/id="[A-Z].*?">([\s\S]*?)\s<\/div>/)[1]).html();
//取屏蔽段落
var content=String(result.match(/function\s*getDecode\(\)\{(.*)\}/)[1]);
//还原屏蔽段落
content=content.replace(/\\/g,"/")
.replace(/[A-Z]=~.*?\('/g,"")
.replace(/#.*?\('/g,"")
.replace(/'\).*/g,"")
.replace(/\+|"/g,"")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.\$__\$/g,"9")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.\$___/g,"8")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.\$\$\$/g,"7")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.\$\$_/g,"6")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.\$_\$/g,"5")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.\$__/g,"4")
.replace(/[A-Z]\._\$\$/g,"3")
.replace(/[A-Z]\._\$_/g,"2")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.__\$/g,"1")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.___/g,"0")
.replace(/\/\/74\/{2,3}160\/\/76/g,"\n")
//大写字母
.replace(/\/\/132/g,"Z")
.replace(/\/\/131/g,"Y")
.replace(/\/\/130/g,"X")
.replace(/\/\/127/g,"W")

.replace(/\/\/120/g,"P")

.replace(/\/\/116/g,"N")
.replace(/\/\/115/g,"M")

.replace(/\/\/113/g,"K")

.replace(/\/\/110/g,"H")
.replace(/\/\/107/g,"G")
.replace(/\/\/106/g,"F")
.replace(/\/\/105/g,"E")
.replace(/\/\/104/g,"D")
.replace(/\/\/103/g,"C")
.replace(/\/\/102/g,"B")
.replace(/\/\/101/g,"A")
.replace(/\/\/100/g,"@")
//小写字母
.replace(/5\_​/g,"a")
.replace(/5\$/g,"b")
.replace(/6\_​/g,"c")
.replace(/6\$/g,"d")
.replace(/7\_​/g,"e")
.replace(/7\$/g,"f")
.replace(/\/\/147/g,"g")
.replace(/\/\/150/g,"h")
.replace(/\/\/151/g,"i")
.replace(/\/\/152/g,"j")
.replace(/\/\/153/g,"k")
.replace(/\(\!\[\]\)\[2\]/g,"l")
.replace(/\/\/155/g,"m")
.replace(/\/\/156/g,"n")
.replace(/[A-Z]\._\$/g,"o")
.replace(/\/\/160/g,"p")
.replace(/\/\/161/g,"q")
.replace(/\/\/162/g,"r")
.replace(/\/\/163/g,"s")
.replace(/[A-Z].__/g,"t")
.replace(/[A-Z]._/g,"u")
.replace(/\/\/166/g,"v")
.replace(/\/\/167/g,"w")
.replace(/\/\/170/g,"x")
.replace(/\/\/171/g,"y")
.replace(/\/\/172/g,"z")
//英文符号
.replace(/\/\/72/g,":")
.replace(/\/\/73/g," ")
.replace(/\/\/77/g,"?")
.replace(/\/\/\/\/u(.{4})/g,"%u$1");
密文=unescape(content)
//放回原位
result=String(a);
result=result.replace(/自动加载/,密文)
//分隔符
.replace(/防采集/g,"")
.replace(/失败.*?浏览器！/g,"")

        iv: iv,

    return JSON.parse(CryptoJS.enc.Utf8.stringify(decryptedData));

ruleSearchList:
<js>
var o = [];
if (!baseUrl.includes('debug')) {
  importClass(org.jsoup.Jsoup);

  var sid = baseUrl.match(/\?_id=([^=&]+)=?/)[1];
  var tmp, data;
  // title, author, tags, new, intro, cover, url
  var page = baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/);
  page = page ? page[1] : '';

  switch (sid) {
    case 'bilibili-zhuanlan': {
      // 哔哩哔哩专栏排行榜
      function toList(str) {
        var arr = JSON.parse(str).data;
        arr.forEach(a => {
          if (o.every(v => v.id !== a.id)) {
            o.push({
              id: a.id,
              title: a.title,
              author: a.author.name,
              tags: a.categories.map(v => v.name),
              intro: a.summary,
              new: a.dynamic,
              cover: a.banner_url,
              url: baseUrl + '&id=' + a.id
            });
          }
        });
      }
      var rankUrl = 'https://api.bilibili.com/x/article/rank/list?cid=';
      // 昨天
      tmp = java.ajax(rankUrl + '3');
      toList(tmp);

      // 前天
      tmp = java.ajax(rankUrl + '4');
      toList(tmp);

      // 周榜
      tmp = java.ajax(rankUrl + '2');
      toList(tmp);

      // 月榜
      tmp = java.ajax(rankUrl + '1');
      toList(tmp);

      break;
    }

    case 'zhihu-daily': {
      o = Jsoup.parse(java.ajax('https://daily.zhihu.com'))
        .select('.main-content-wrap a')
        .toArray()
        .map(a => {
          var url = 'https://daily.zhihu.com' + a.attr('href');
          var J = Jsoup.parse(java.ajax(url));
          var author = J.select('.meta .author')
            .text()
            .replace('，', '');
          return {
            url: url,
            title: a.text(),
            cover: a.select('img').attr('src'),
            author: author,
            tags: [author],
            new: J.select('.meta .bio').text(),
            intro: J.select('.content p:first-child')
              .text()
              .trim()
          };
        })
        .filter(v => !v.title.includes('如何正确地吐槽'));
      break;
    }

    case 'hujiang-en': {
      var url = 'https://www.hjenglish.com/fanyi/shuangyu';

      url += page ? '_' + page + '/' : '/';

      var groups = Jsoup.parse(java.ajax(url))
        .select('.left-content .sp-article-module')
        .toArray()
        .forEach(list => {
          var defaulCover = list.select('img').attr('data-src');
          list
            .select('a')
            .toArray()
            .forEach(a => {
              var title = a.text().replace('有声双语美文：', '');

              if (/优惠秒杀|英语课程/.test(title)) return;

              var url = 'https://www.hjenglish.com' + a.attr('href');
              var J = Jsoup.parse(java.ajax(url)).select('.module-article');
              var cover = J.select('#J-article-content img:first-child').attr(
                'src'
              );
              cover = String(cover).trim();
              var content = J.select(
                '#J-article-content div[class*=langs]'
              ).html();
              var author = J.select('.info span:first-child').text();
              var trans = J.select('#J-article-content')
                .html()
                .match(/（(翻译：.+)）/);
              var tags = [author];
              if (trans) {
                tags.push(trans[1]);
              }
              o.push({
                cover: cover || defaulCover,
                title: title,
                url: url,
                author: author.replace('作者：', ''),
                tags: tags,
                new: J.select('.info span:nth-child(2)').text(),
                intro: content.slice(0, 500) + '...'
              });
            });
        });

      break;
    }

    case 'tophub-today': {
      var p = page ? '?p=' + page : '';
      var baseurl = 'https://tophub.today';

      function toList(url, nav) {
        var list = [];
        var J = Jsoup.parse(java.ajax(url));
        var tcs = J.select('.bc-tc').toArray();
        var ccs = J.select('.bc-cc').toArray();
        tcs.forEach((tc, i) => {
          var cc = ccs[i];
          var cds = cc.select('.cc-cd').toArray();
          cds.forEach(cd => {
            var title = cd.select('.cc-cd-lb').text();
            var tag = cd.select('.cc-cd-sb-st').text();
            var links = cd.select('.nano-content a').toArray();
            var intro = links
              .map((link, i) => i + 1 + '. ' + link.select('.t').text())
              .join('\n---\n');
            list.push({
              cover: cd.select('.cc-cd-lb img').attr('src'),
              title: title + ' - ' + tag,
              url: baseurl + cd.select('.cc-cd-is a').attr('href'),
              tags: [nav],
              new: cd.select('.i-h').text(),
              intro: intro
            });
          });
        });
        return list;
      }

      var navs = {
        综合: 'news',
        科技: 'tech',
        娱乐: 'ent',
        社区: 'community'
      };

      var lists = [];
      for (var name in navs) {
        var list = toList(baseurl + '/c/' + navs[name] + p, name);
        lists.push(list);
      }
      lists[0].forEach((v, i) => {
        lists.forEach((l, j) => {
          o.push(lists[j][i]);
        });
      });
    }
  }
}

o;

</js>
ruleBookContent:
<js>
var tmp, sid, id;
var text = '';
var alias = {
  'tophub.today': 'tophub-today',
  'daily.zhihu': 'zhihu-daily',
  hjenglish: 'hujiang-en'
};

if (baseUrl.includes('_id')) {
  sid = baseUrl.match(/\?_id=([^=&]+)=?/)[1];
  id = baseUrl.match(/[^_]id=([^=&]+)=?/)[1];
} else {
  for (var key in alias) {
    if (baseUrl.includes(key)) {
      sid = alias[key];
      break;
    }
  }
}

switch (sid) {
  case 'bilibili-zhuanlan': {
    tmp = java.ajax('https://www.bilibili.com/read/cv' + id);
    java.setContent(tmp);
    text = java.getString('class.article-holder@html');
    break;
  }
  case 'zhihu-daily': {
    text = java.getString('class.content@html');
    break;
  }
  case 'hujiang-en': {
    text = String(java.getString('class.article-content@html')).replace(
      /（翻译.+）|图片来源.+/g,
      ''
    );
    break;
  }
  case 'tophub-today': {
    text = String(java.getString('class.Zd-p-Sc@html'))
      .replace(
        //g,
        '\n.\n                      - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -\n.\n'
      )
      .replace(/网页端只展示.+/, '');
    break;
  }
}

if (!text) {
  text = '｡◕‿◕｡' + (sid ? '\n' + sid : '');
}

text;

</js>
